body: Well it seems like the demon king is defeated so he goes and pretends he's the hero to the mom then impregnates her and then the end is the hero returning to find his mom pregnant and her throwing herself at him since she thinks he's the one who got her pregnant while the demon lord is slowly reincarnating in her womb.

Or the pendant represented not just a protection, but her "purity" (as in NOT fucking her son! Flashback showed his father acted the same with the "sexual harassment" though this is Demon Lord as Hero is just a mommas boy...unless some of that were flashbacks), so her disregarding it symbolized her no longer caring about the "sweet home Alabama" taboo (she likely thinks he left out abit and came back at the end! Which surprises the hero, but his lack of resistance from the kiss means he wanted this in a way, doubt he'll question HOW he "impregnated" his MILF! Which will bite them all in the ass! BS Demon Lord beat him home first LOL)

Can't really see if this is NTR stabini! Feels like Incest...slightly (I think the blond is the hero's MILF!). Demon Lord did a twofer! NTR his MILF from dead father (though it's directed at Hero since she believes that was him or she always wanted to Sweet Home Alabama her son, but was loyal to her husband, the pendant likely symbolizing this) and assured his future body (she did birth the hero who beat him!). Hero looks like a mommas boy so win for him...for now! MuHahaha
Hmm "Win the fight but lose the war"
Lol. I saw the cover + 'Neto'tte and thought "This is NTR". Check. No tag? Hmm. Start reading. AHH, there it is.
